## Slide with R Output

install.packages("raster", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(raster)
install.packages("cluster", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(cluster)

NDVI <- function (NIR,red){
  (NIR-red)/(NIR+red)
}
